SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT009
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent from SWIFT to a LT when SWIFT wishes the LT to logout. The message is only a request. However, if the request is not acted upon by the addressed LT, the system sends an abort message.
From: GPA To: User

SystemField.Name: day-time
SystemField.description: Day and time, local to the user, when the system will initiate an abort if the LT does not logout.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: day-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFTNetwork is in GMT.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid day-time '" + $value + "'. day-time should be in format ddHHmm."
